content: I think I'll go with the solid dividers to create a clean separation between sections. I also want to add some Marvel-themed decorations to make it more visually appealing. I've got a few Marvel posters and a Spider-Man logo sign that I can hang above the shelf to create a cohesive look. Speaking of Spider-Man, I recently got the new Spider-Man: No Way Home figures at the comic-con event last weekend, which now brings my total Spider-Man collection to 12 figures.
